prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a blue body and a yellow accent.
Imagine a creature that thrives in wetlands, blending shades of blue and white.
Design a Pokemon that has a distinct whisker-like feature and is aquatic in nature.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a round shape, featuring blue and yellow colors.
Show me a playful water Pokemon that resembles a catfish with unique whisker traits.
Make a Pokemon that can live in both urban and wetland areas, with vibrant blue hues.
Give me a Pokemon that evokes a sense of calm and has a rounded, smooth body.
